website_summaries.verdict: Skinnytaste highlights that you don’t have to sacrifice taste for a healthier meal, and with so many quality recipes, you’re guaranteed to find a few favorites.
pros: 140 flavorful, yet easy to prepare dishes to make counting calories far easier
cons: Fewer slow cooker recipes than you may expect

customer_reviews.title: This cookbook is amazing! My husband and I pick about 4 meals ...
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is amazing! My husband and I pick about 4 meals a week to make. The grocery list is pretty simple and usually under $100. We always have left overs. The recipes are super easy to make and the ingredients are pretty simple as well. I had a hard time finding a cookbook but I really love this one!
customer_reviews.author: marsh6909

customer_reviews.title: I love the Skinnytaste books
customer_reviews.text: I love the Skinnytaste books. My family has been eating only Skinnytaste recipes for a while now and losing lots of weight sticking to the perfect portions. I wanted to add some new recipes to what we have been doing and this book was just what we needed. I was not disappointed and everything we have tried has been great!!!
customer_reviews.author: sweetjoey

customer_reviews.title: SKINNYTASTE FTW!
customer_reviews.text: So far I've made 10 recipes from it and they are all phenomenal! Korean Beef Tacos, Egg rice bowl, Bahn Mi Bowls, Korean beef tacos, Chicken Tikka Masala - are just a few of my favs! Everything is so good, flavorful and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Jlewis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful book! I absolutely love everything about this book. I'm a Weight Watchers member, RN and mom to a toddler, so this book is an answer to my prayers. So far I've made the Hamburger Stroganoff and Grilled Cumin-Rubbed Skirt Steak Tacos with Pickled Red Onions....both were delicious and so easy to make! I love the chapter devoted to tacos for Taco Tuesday and the section in the beginning that has a meal plan. This book will be my go-to for sure!
customer_reviews.author: The Girly Girl Cooks

customer_reviews.title: Love Hate Relationship
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review based upon inputs from my wife - as far as the cooking of the recipes. I can attest to the eating side of the equation, however and I must say the food is remarkably flavorful and delicious. We both are amazed at how the author achieves such a large number of satisfying meals with such a low calorie count. We highly recommend this book for people who love to cook, love to eat and hate to exercise.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: All her meals are delicious!! I love the slow cooker because it's easy to set up and make great meals with little effort. I've lost 30 lbs doing exclusively her recipes and weight watchers. Highly recommend this book. I bought a copy for myself, my mom, and sister
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes! I can hardly believe some of them are "diet" recipes. After work and the gym, I usually get home too late to spend an hour prepping a meal so if I don't want to eat at 8 or 9 at night I tend to look for recipes that are either quick or utilize the slow cooker, which I love using! This cookbook is perfect for those kind of meals! Plus I always have leftovers and when I go to heat up my food for lunch the next day my coworkers are always asking me about what I made! I still like her original cookbook the best but this is still packed with some great easy recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I follow Gina on Instagram and Facebook and love her recipes
customer_reviews.text: I follow Gina on Instagram and Facebook and love her recipes. There is not one recipe I have made that hasn’t turned out great. Most of them are pretty simple. I am single no kids and used to hate to cook (but also hated fast food) so life was a lot of cereal or grilled cheese but what I love about her recipes is I can half the recipe or freeze them and her cookbooks have definitely made a difference in my “confidence” in the kitchen. Buy it if you like cookbooks-you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Another strike out
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could stop wasting my money UGH if you like spending all your time in the kitchen GO AHEAD I know how to cook and just wanted to cook healthier and leaner but my family is not going to eat most of the recipes in here and I am not spending all my time cooking
customer_reviews.author: MsHatch20

customer_reviews.title: The BEST cookbook for NEW ideas!
customer_reviews.text: I am cooking through this cookbook and just love how EASY everything is to prepare and cook!! Every recipe is delicious, not to mention healthy! Beautiful pictures, clear instructions. Gives ideas for substitutes sometimes. There’s Indian, Korean, Mexican, Filipino, Czech inspired recipes and more!! It has really made my meals so much less boring and much more flavorful!
customer_reviews.author: TBDrahos

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cookbook!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! Every recipe I've ever made out of this book has been a big hit with my entire family, never a single complaint. Can't wait to continue making my way through this book trying out new recipes. Well worth the money. Would recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: My wife LOVES the first Skinnytaste cookbook so naturally I had to get her the second one. I'm happy to say she loves it just as much as the first and I have been the beneficiary of some delicious meals!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent recipes from a gifted cookbook author. I thought “Skinnytaste” was going to be a cheap meal ideas for suburban moms but these recipes are super-inspired, wildly-fresh, and absolutely delivious. I’ve lost 17 pounds in less than two months with exercise and eating from this book. If you enjoy cooking, you’ll enjoy making these recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Gina does it again!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first Skinnytaste book, and immediately ordered this one when it came out. It does not disappoint. Slow-cooker recipes are life savers for me, so I think I might even like this book better than the first! I wouldn't have gotten to my goal weight without the delicious recipes that Gina has in these books.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Skinny Taste
customer_reviews.text: I love Skinny Taste! I've been cooking from her website for months now and decided to buy her books. I've made several things from her books and all of them turned out wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Starsforophelia

customer_reviews.title: Great meals that are healthy too!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Skinny Taste cookbook. I’m a huge fan of Gina Homolka and her excellent recipes! Each recipe is easy to follow and bursting with flavor. Looking through this cookbook I can already tell that I’m going to have more favorites to add to my list. I love that I can serve my family great meals that are healthy too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy for any cooking skill level
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this book. I'm not a cook. By any sense of the imagination. This book has provided with sensible staple meals that my family does not get tired of. Easy to make and delicious. My friend who suggested the book and I make meals and give each other feedback. We are both very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: AgeMil

customer_reviews.title: Taking the intimidation out of meal planning for the week!
customer_reviews.text: I was bookmarking recipes I found on her website for the past six months. I'm glad I decided to get the cookbook. Yes, you will find some of the recipes on her website, but the additional tips and a month meal plan using recipes found in the book are what what make this a good purchase. Meal planning is a pain and takes time, but with this cookbook and her guidance it is much easier and less intimidating.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SIMPLE RECIPES
customer_reviews.text: OMG! A co-worker mentioned this book had fabulous recipes, but I had no idea! I've been cooking for years, feeding a family that is used to fine restaurant cuisine. THEY LOVE THESE RECIPES! Some of the slow cook are even better the next day. You can't miss with these simple recipes that end up so elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Orona

customer_reviews.title: The best cookbook I have used in years
customer_reviews.text: Received this book several days ago and all my meals, except for one, the last 4 days were from this cookbook. I use my husband as a critic whenever I use a new recipe. Even if I like it and he thinks the meal is just okay, I will not use the recipe again. Every meal I made, he loved. I can't wait to try more, and I hope they are as delicious as the ones I have so far enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Snead

customer_reviews.title: I love SkinnyTaste! Honestly
customer_reviews.text: I love SkinnyTaste! Honestly, Gina's recipes aren't particularly unique, but they are easy to make & I have a newborn & a 3-year old & a full-time job & easy & tasty are the name of the game around here. I have never been disappointed in anything I've ever made by her. The photos are gorgeous too!
customer_reviews.author: Chris O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Geat Recipes
customer_reviews.text: I am a Gina fan and look forward to purchasing her third cookbook, One and Done as I have both including fast and slow. Every recipe has a beautiful picture, all contain nutrition information). Her directions are easy to follow and all are delicious. A few of my favorites - Egg Roll in a Bowl (low WW sp’s) slow cooker baked sweet potatoes (a full meal) and slow cooker Banh Mi rice bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes, great results!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this cookbook. Can't comment on ALL the recipes (it's take a long time to try them all), but the dozen or so that we've tried have been excellent all the way around. Something in here for every palate and great for someone like me who is a lazy cook! I love dumping ingredients in the slow cooker and forgetting about it!
customer_reviews.author: FlyboyyyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to the Skinnytaste collection!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of the skinnytaste website and Gina for years so it was only natural that once I have birth to my son I needed new recipes that were quick and for slow cookers! This is perfect! Our favorites are the taco recipe and the one sheet chicken and veggies!
customer_reviews.author: MMontag19

customer_reviews.title: Great book with a ton of variety
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what to expect from the recipes in the book but after trying a couple recipes it has become my new go to for the winter. It has a great variety of recipes whether you want to use your slow cooker or whip something up quickly. So far I have made ~20 different items and I would say all but 2 turned out as new favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Not as useful as I had hoped. I have only made one recipe, a chili, and we were disappointed, had to add ingredients to make it something we liked. It seems as if many of the recipes have ingredients I don't usually stock. I may give this cookbook to the library.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: This book has recipes for those nights when you have no time to make dinner and recipes for the slow cooker. The slow cooker recipes are great and I loved the chili! It's a great cookbook with lots of pictures and helpful hints.
customer_reviews.author: Lawgrrl34

customer_reviews.title: Another great SkinnyTaste Book!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first book and this one is equally as great. I'm a huge slow cooker user so this book is great for me. I love the variety in the recipes and that there are not too many odd (ie hard to find in my rural community) ingredients. Many of the recipes make huge portions that easily freeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy , convenient & delicius !
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is by far the best one I've ever owned. The quick ones are for nights I don't have much time , the slowcooker ones are for when I want it done by the time I get home from work . She provides full macro info on all recipes which is helpful while dieting , my 4 year old and husband have loved every recipe I've made ! Her ingredient list is also very easy to shop for . Love skinnytaste !! We never go out to eat anymore , Her recipes are delicious and better for you !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the shrimp a la criolla are tasty and super easy to prep
customer_reviews.text: I've made several of the recipes. The greek chicken sheet pan dinner, the Italian sausage, white bean and escarole soup (I substitute with kale), the creamy tomato soup, and the shrimp a la criolla are tasty and super easy to prep. I didn't care much for the chicken paprika, and in general, I haven't had much success with slow cooking drumsticks.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great varity of recipes
customer_reviews.text: I have developed a healthier eating plan and this cookbook fits my plans and has a lot of new recipes for me to try. I have already used several . There are all types of meals including vegetarian dishes and ingredients that add a lot of flavor. Most have pictures with them. The only downfall would be some have ingredients not available at a normal grocery. Luckily there is a specialty store here.
customer_reviews.author: V. West

customer_reviews.title: We love everything from this book
customer_reviews.text: We love everything from this book. The chicken cacciatore is our favorite. All my kids devour it, even my baby who asks for more. They are also very easy and don't require too many ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M. Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Love her recipes
customer_reviews.text: Love her recipes! Cook using one from either this book or her first one daily! I love the daily recipes I get via email too! You don't have to go out and buy a lot of ingredients that you will use only once. If you use the recipes you can take off weight without really trying and everything is soooo tasty!
customer_reviews.author: Carol J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great cookbook!! This cookbook is awesome. I've made so many recipes out of it and my family has loved them. Everything is so easy to make and I love that there is not a lot of prep work for most meals. Plus my house now always smells amazing from the stuff I'm cooking in the crockpot.
customer_reviews.author: Sandopedia

customer_reviews.title: Easier healthy and delicious cooking - great for the crockpot
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I actually have a dairy allergy and I swapped some things for dairy free substitutes and it still tasted great. I’m in law school and I just don’t have time for complicated recipes but my weight went up the first year of school and I started making and freezing meals from this cookbook the past two weeks. I’ve started to lose weight again and the meals are fantastic. This book is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: so many recipes
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cookbook so may different recipes and they have pictures, so you can see how it suppose to look like when you make it. I have tried a few and so far they have all been delicious ! I really recommend buying this book if you are looking to cooking healthy delicious meals.
customer_reviews.author: bossbabe1980

customer_reviews.title: Nice cook book
customer_reviews.text: Nice cook book . Recipies are easy and taste good . I would recommend it to anyone who is watching their weight .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great menu ideas
customer_reviews.text: Our family uses this book an average of twice a week for meal planning. My only complaint is that sometimes ingredients called for in construction of a meal are somewhat unrealistic. All in all a great cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fus

customer_reviews.title: Easy, tasty and skinny!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the range of recipes. Have tried several in the crockpot and they turned out great. I'm not much of a beef or pork eater, and there were several of those in the book. Red-meat lovers rejoice!
customer_reviews.author: Copy That Clicks

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: We got an Instant Pot for Christmas and this was recommended to us for recipes to make in it. While it doesn't have as many recipes for the IP as we thought, it still have some fabulous recipes that are incredibly easy to make and are very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this book.. made Korean beef bowl and was blown away at how delicious it was. My hard to please husband kept saying how he loved it. So glad I bought this beautiful book. Can't wait to try more recipes. The pictures are wonderful, an asset to any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Love these cookbooks
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to try any of the recipes yet but have glanced through the book and seen some I'm looking forward to cooking. I have her 1st cookbook and like that the recipes are easy to follow, have simple ingredients (not stuff that you've never heard of), taste great and are WW friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent recipes made with ingredients I have on hand. Simple to follow. Have really enjoyed the couple I've made. Some have complained about recipes being bland or not adequate for their crockpot scheduling needs. As with any recipe, you can always adjust seasonings for your own tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after the rave reviews this book received
customer_reviews.text: Pictures and styling of this book is gorgeous. Recipes were not practical. Complicated. Nothing in this book that my husband or I would eat. Disappointed after the rave reviews this book received. Hardly any Slow Cooker options.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: This is "the one"
customer_reviews.text: Be ready to immerse yourself in healthy, flavorful cooking. It will easily become your favorite cookbook. It has wick meals for busy nights and crockpot meals for even busier nights. The recipes are a win for all age groups and taste preferences. If this cookbook was a man, I'd marry it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: I love the recipes on Skinnytaste, so it's no surprise that I LOVE this cookbook. Such great ideas and easy to follow recipes. And if you are following weight watchers, just go to the website for a list of point values for every recipe. Super easy!
customer_reviews.author: BuckeyeTrading

customer_reviews.title: easy to prepare and cook and I recommend her books ...
customer_reviews.text: I've lost 35 lbs since April using Weight Watchers and Gina's recipes have been a huge part of that loss. Her recipes are tasty, easy to prepare and cook and I recommend her books to everyone. The cookbooks done come with the points already calculated but I use my own calculator in my WW app and then just write it in the book.
customer_reviews.author: AlisonW

customer_reviews.title: Not my style
customer_reviews.text: As much as I wanted to love this,....I just don't. The recipes are almost all made with either things that are not available locally, or ingredients I just don't eat. I am just more basic I suppose. If you like fancy, and healthy, cooking, this is for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I liked this book a lot
customer_reviews.text: I liked this book a lot. The food combination were different but good. I especially liked the herbs and spices she used.
customer_reviews.author: mary jane flynn

customer_reviews.title: Love all the recipes that I have tried from this ...
customer_reviews.text: Love all the recipes that I have tried from this book. Gina also has a blog that I follow on Facebook. Just by cooking "Skinnytaste recipes I have been able to loose almost 25 pounds!! The recipes are things you prepare everyday, just lightened up.
customer_reviews.author: Helen I Chandler

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite cookbook! I love everything about this book - concept, design, and of course, the recipes themselves. Never have I flipped through a cookbook and wanted to make nearly everything in it. If you prefer one type of cuisine, this isn't the book for you - but if, like me, you love a variety of foods check it out!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Favorite cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooks book! It was my first, and now I have the whole collection of skinnytaste cook books. Been using this one frequently of late for a couple soup recipes my family loves and enjoys very much in this chilly weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: I have made several recipes already and all have been ...
customer_reviews.text: I have made several recipes already and all have been delicious! The book is extra grest because she has provided the nutritional content.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Skinnytaste cookbook but won't be my last. Korean lettuce wraps, Spanish Chicken with olives...whoa..seriously good.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: but like skinnytaste's last cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I've only made a few recipes so far from this book, but like skinnytaste's last cookbook, the recipes do not disappoint. There s great balance between the fast and slow recipes. I also really like that most of her recipes don't require that many ingredients. I can't wait to try more recipes. One thing I do suggest is getting a spiralizer because there are a few veggie noodle recipes in here.
customer_reviews.author: Alix Garic

customer_reviews.title: Love this cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: fantastic cookbook! So far all the recipes I've tried have been a hit. Love that it's either a 30 min recipe (approx) or a crock pot. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy alternative recipe book!
customer_reviews.text: Love this recipe book. Easy recipes, quick to make for healthy alternatives . I did have to tweak a few, but all in all a great book!
customer_reviews.author: tipsfrompips

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cookbook. I recently had a baby and dont have time to cook. I needed recipes for quick & crock pot meals. I’m familiar with her other cook book “One and Done”. So I gave this one a try. Once again she did not disappoint. My family has loved every meal I’ve made from this book so far!!! We plan on buying a few more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Marie B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! Can't wait to get cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting for this to arrive at my doorstep! Pretty much stalked the mailman!!! Looking through this tonight, I am as excited as a kid at Christmas time flipping through a toy catalogue! Can't wait to make the grilled cheese w/ havarti, Brussels sprouts & apple and the slow cooker chicken tikka masala. The salad pizza looks delish! Pretty excited for the whole book! Don't miss out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has become my new favorite cookbook! I use my crockpot once a week ...
customer_reviews.text: This has become my new favorite cookbook! I use my crockpot once a week now that I have this. Every recipe has been very easy to make (HUGE plus) and also very delicious! This is now my go to any time I'm cooking. I love how easy the recipes are and how quick it is to throw together for the crockpot.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook. I have tried several recipes from it and I will continue to try until I taste them all.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Page missing but still happy.
customer_reviews.text: Had to take a start away for missing page. I think that should have been mentioned by the seller. Luckily I don't think I'd use those two recipes. I've tried some of her recipes from her blog and they were tasty and filling and I have lost some weight. Excited for the rest of the book.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Solid recipes for successful healthy eating
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is astounding! I’ve made about 10 recipes already and every single one is a hit with the family. These are the best meals I’ve ever cooked! I also love using all the fresh ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: LMSB

customer_reviews.title: Laika's mom
customer_reviews.text: Omg Gina this is the best book, I'm hoping you will eventually write a book with no wheat or dairy products in it, until then I adjust the recipes as needed, they are so delicious, you are an excellent chef !
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: love everything Skinnytaste!
customer_reviews.text: Love both her books! Husband and kids love everything I've cooked so far! Excited to make more recipes! I lost 50 lbs the year her first book came out, had another baby and am losing this weight like a boss!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Britton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COOKBOOK
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS GOING TO MY DAUGHTER IN LAW- WHO IS LEARNING HOW TO COOK.. SHE WILL LOVE THIS SINCE SHE IS ALSO TRYING TO EAT HEALTHIER AND COOK LIGHTER DISHES..
customer_reviews.author: JANONE

customer_reviews.title: they have some great recipes
customer_reviews.text: Great cookbook It had some good recipes that I still use today after having the book for more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Merlyn

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Really was looking forward to this cookbook because I love the blog that created it, however all the recipes can be found online.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea W.

customer_reviews.title: Book falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The recipes are amazing but the book itself fell apart. The binding is coming undone. I bought it a month ago, it shouldn’t be doing this.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. M.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest cookbook yet!
customer_reviews.text: Best cookbook I've ever bought! Every recipe is delicious. Even my son and husband are enjoying the meals. Simple ingredients and everything is 30 min to cook or put into a slow cooker while I work! This book has saved me from a slump of repetitive meals on my weight loss! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Rogers

customer_reviews.title: My favorite by far
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my all time favorite cookbooks. I enjoyed the first one, but this one showed me so many new ingredients and tastes and flavors I never knew about. And probably wouldn’t have, either. This is the one I know I will continue to use as long as I have working hands and a kitchen haha!
customer_reviews.author: literarymuffin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome recipes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use recipes. No unusual herbs or spices to have to stock up on. Slow cooker recipes are great for my days off.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Porter

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cookbooks I have had the pleasure of cooking my way through. I could eat these recipes over and over again. Also love the layout and quality of the book itself. Great recipes, great cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Ok cook book.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cook book. Was expecting more recipes for the slow cooker. Of course there are some. And the ones that are there are good ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cookbook with lots of pictures
customer_reviews.text: So many recipes I want to try & make! Great cookbook with easy to follow directions & great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Healthy Recipes Easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Great cookbook easy to follow recipes. Family favorite is the Slow Cooker Meatballs. I used this several times with my family and also substituted the turkey with venison. Yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Must have for busy people  trying to eat healthy
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook has been the secret to my success with weight watchers. I use it almost every day! Do calculate the points before deciding on what to cook, because not everything is super points friendly
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook! Have made several of the recipes and everything has turned out great. They are easy to follow and fairly quick, always healthy. I found a new love for cooking again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best cook book ever! Gina knows how to make healthy food taste delicious! I started making meals from the Skinnytaste website and was hooked immediately. My mom bought me this cookbook as a present because I have been bragging about my family dinners for months. I was pleasantly surprised by the amount of recipes too. Egg roll bowl for the win!
customer_reviews.author: LT_Pgh_26

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookbook!! Such great ideas for dinner and the desserts are great too!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This book has great recipes. I love that at the beginning of each section it has a list of recipes and specifies if they are slow cook or quick recipes. Great cookbook!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good recipes, good pictures, and good descriptions of some unfamiliar ingredients. Easy to follow. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent & healthy recipes. I recently joined Noom & I like the nutrition content. Easy recipes & full of flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna W.

customer_reviews.title: Delish
customer_reviews.text: Great cookbook full of beautiful pictures and delicious recipes! Most seem to be ones you can’t get on her website either.
customer_reviews.author: Steeley

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the skinnytaste books. Great, easy recipes. This book does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: LeanneC

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook! I have followed Gina's blog for years but the cookbook is just a more organized way to have all of this author's great recipes.
customer_reviews.author: That’s my Patty!

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for Sure
customer_reviews.text: Gina's two cookbooks sit on my kitchen counter and are opened almost every day for ideas. This has great and easy recipes in every one I've tried. 5 Stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Good recipes
customer_reviews.text: Good recipes with lots of ideas tried several with good results
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: I love this cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook! Im not very good about cooking. I have 2 year old twin boys so now I'm always trying to figure out what to make! So far everything has been so so good and so easy!! I've never had a cookbook like this one. Love love it love it and so do my boys! Highly recommend this book. Can't say enough about it! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Chetto

customer_reviews.title: Everything I have tried has been excellent. I made the pork tacos today and took ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything I have tried has been excellent. I made the pork tacos today and took to a dinner party, they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DPK

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Delicious Easy to make and great photos
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookbook- every recipe I have tried is wonderful- easy to prepare and all with beautiful photos of the recipes! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A GREAT COOKBOOK!!
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A GREAT COOKBOOK!! I love every recipe, and plan on giving this for Christmas to all the cooks in the family! Beautiful pictures; great suggestions; and I'm falling in love with my slow cooker again! Very Healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love looking for new
customer_reviews.text: On Weight Watchers. Love looking for new, healthy recipes that are tasty . . . & easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This book looks great and offers both slow cooker recipes and regular ones
customer_reviews.text: This book looks great and offers both slow cooker recipes and regular ones. I haven't had a chance to try one yet, but I know, just paging thru it that there are lots of recipes I want to try. I think this book's greatest asset is that it has such a variety of all kinds of meals, and all different ways of cooking them.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I've been obsessed with Skinnytaste for a few years now. I have both of her books and love them. I haven't had a bad dish yet!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Weren't as pretty as yours but
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to finally get your new cookbook!!! Made the Southwest egg rolls. Weren't as pretty as yours but, came out delicious!!! Can't wait to try another recipe. Everything looks amazing, just like your first book!!! Thanks for all the great meal ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Most Used Cookbook in our House
customer_reviews.text: We have all of the Skinnytaste cookbooks and we use them all, and this one in particular, every single week. It’s full of easy, healthy, and most importantly, tasty recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Aden

customer_reviews.title: Great cook book
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for recipes with great flavor combinations and healthy, this is fabulous cook book.
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cook book. I have made several recipes and all were easy and very tasty!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love her recipes would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Check out her Facebook page as well. Love her recipes would definitely recommend. This book was a lot bigger than I thought it was (as in a lot more recipes!!). Thank you Gina!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Skinnytaste Fast and Slow: Knockout Quick-Fix and Slow Cooker Recipes: A Cookbook
